creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: embroidered panel; natural fabric with geometric embroidery in red, green, black and navy; dark maroon fringe on 2 1/2 sides; red fabric along edges with attached fringe; unfringed edge: darker red fabric with printed red design
dimension: 19 3/4 x 22 5/8 in. (50.17 x 57.47 cm) (without fringe - fringe approximately 2" long)
title: Mirror cover (aynakhalta)
